meanings.def: doing the same thing in the same way several times; done in the same way several times
examples: He is wanted for serial murder.
Such people can be described as serial monogamists.

meanings.def: broadcast or published in several separate parts
examples: The BBC has taken each installment of Charles Dickens' serial novel ‘Bleak House’ and created 15 half-hour episodes.
tasks carried out in the same serial order
A nutritious breakfast cereal can contribute to a healthy lifestyle.
All the female characters in this serial are very strong.
The novel was first published in serial form.

meanings.def: a story that is broadcast or published in several separate parts on television, on the radio, on the internet, in a magazine, etc.
examples: A nutritious breakfast cereal can contribute to a healthy lifestyle.
All the female characters in this serial are very strong.
The novel was first published in serial form.
